name: Time Shifter
description:
Time Shifter is a top down single player game where the player is experiencing the effects of time distortion and is challenged to kill his other selfs over and over until he cannot manage to do so.

The player start with 3 lives and can earn more lives by killing other version of himself from previous timelines. The player loose one life everytime he is shoot by one of his time twins or if he touch one of them.

The player needs to go collect a star to obtain a weapon randomly assigned and bring chaos to the timelines

This game have been created by Philipp Kogelnig ,Bernhard Raml and Pierre Der Kegorkyan, for the Mayhem Game Jam 2016 in Vienna, Austri. The theme was : "You are your worst enemy"

Additional Sources:

Graphics: Kenney Art http://www.kenney.nl/

Sound Effects: Universal Sound FX https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/17256

Music: Kevin MacLeod http://freemusicarchive.org/music/kevin_macleod

Particles: Elements https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/11158 ; KTK Effects https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/25081

Background Image: agsandrew http://www.shutterstock.com/gallery-553555p1.html
